name: Carthage, Sidi Bou Said , Bardo and Medina Explorer
summary: Full-Day Carthage, Sidi Bou Said, Bardo Museum & Medina Private Tour from Tunis
description: Hit the highlights of Tunisia on this three-for-one guided day trip, which covers the seaside village of Sidi Boy Said and two UNESCO World Heritage sites. Discover Roman ruins alongside Tunisias stunning coastline at the archaeological site of Carthage and get an insiders perspective on traditional markets and mosques in the Old City of Tunis. Tours include a tasty local lunch along the coast. A full-day, three-for-one guided tour of Sidi Bou Said, Tunis Old City, and Carthage Get a behind-the-scenes glimpse of traditional cap-makers and perfume markets in the medina Enjoy private hotel transfers and ride comfortably in a climate-controlled private car Explore priceless artifacts from Phoenician and Roman times at the Bardo National Museum

name: The Sahara Desert Camper
summary: Beautiful days in the desert sahara
description: Trek through the Sahara desert atop a camel like an early explorer on this 2-day guided trek. With a guide in the lead to show you the ropes of camel-wrangling and provide insightful information on the sights, this ambitious overnight trek will go off without a hitch. Learn about the Bedouin and Berber ways that have kept people alive in the desert for centuries, combined with the modern conveniences of included meals and lodging. One night of accommodation in a desert camp Meals included Camel and traditional dress provided Cameleer guide provides instruction and directions Hotel pickup and drop-off in Douz

name: The Discovery Private Tour Adventurer
description: Travel all over Tunisia with ease on this 5-day private tour with a guide. Visit El Jem, Kairouan, Tozeur, Douz, Tataouine, Tunis, and more. Accompanied by your guide, see the original Star Wars set, go camping in the Sahara, and admire ancient Roman amphitheaters. Enjoy local meals and dinners at your hotels. Learn about Tunisia from your guide Go camping in the Sahara Desert Enjoy four nights accommodation Admire the amphitheater at El Jem

name: The Sea Lover
description: At 9h, the boat leaves the marina and heads to sea with a pleasant musical atmosphere on board. During the trip several animations will be proposed. If you're lucky, you can spot some dolphins and feats your camera lenses! You will also attend a traditional fishing session. On the Island of Flamingos, you will have enough time to swim and tan. At noon, a delightful lunch will be offered to you in a lovely setting. The menu includes: Tunisian salad, brick Tunisian couscous, grilled fish, cola, mint tea, fruits of the season. After lunch you can either attend a session animation or return to the shore At 14h you return feeling elated and the sounds of cheer fill the air as you arrive at the tourist port of Houmet Souk.

name: The Sahara Adventurer
summary: Tatouine - Chenenni - Ksar Ghuilaine - Matmata: 2 days visit
description: Discover the highlights of southern Tunisia on a small-group tour from Djerba to Tatouine, Chenenni, Ksar Ghuilaine, and Matmata. An included overnight at a camp in the Sahara Desert means sunrise and sunset among beautiful dunes, and you ll have time to wander colorful markets, visit a fortified ksar, explore an oasis, see a troglodyte house, and more. Cover key highlights of southern Tunisia in two days Convenient pickup and drop-off in Djerba Stay energized for exploring with included meals Group size is limited to 6 for personalized service

name: The Safari Lover
summary: 2 Days 4x4 PRIVATE safari from Sousse, Hammamet, Tunis, night in tent
description: Have an unforgettable desert experience, enjoying striking scenery, fun activities, and fascinating history, during this 2-day, 1-night trip from Sousse. Explore a landscape of towering mountains, endless sand dunes and lush oases as you stop to visit a variety of historical sites, including UNESCO World Heritage-listed Roman amphitheater and a historic mosque. Youll also get to join fun activities, like camel riding and off-road driving, and spend one night in a tent. This action-packed desert safari includes accommodations, meals, guide and round-trip hotel transport. Take a 2-day, 1-night desert Jeep safari from Sousse Admire the striking desert scenery featuring the Atlas Mountains, sand dunes and lush oases Check out fascinating historical sites including a UNESCO World Heritage-listed Roman amphitheater Participate in fun activities including camel riding and off-road driving Spend the night under the stars during an overnight in a desert tent Experience desert life during visits with local Berbers

name: The Nature Explorer
summary: Day Excursion to Uthina Zaghouan and Thuburbo Majus from Tunis or Hammamet
description: From Tunis, the road runs alongside a partially restored Roman aqueduct, reminding that Tunis, since ancient times, has been drinking spring water from the mountain of Zaghouan. Along the way, fans of archeology will appreciate the site of Oudna, a Punic city that has become Roman. The so-called “Laberii” villa with its thirty rooms on 2,300 m² deserves a special visit for its mosaics, an archaeological site well preserved includes an astonishing amphitheater that could once accommodate 20,000 spectators. Then we will visit the Andalusian medina of Zaghouan, to finish with Thuburbo Majus, an ancient city that experienced a decline in the middle of the third century before a brilliant renaissance in the fourth century, leading it to proclaim itself Respublica Felix Thuburbo Majus. The vandal invasion, in the middle of the fifth century, put an end to the prosperity of the city and brought it back to the rank of a town which soon after the Arab conquest was deserted.

name: Cool Down in Tozeur
summary: Half-Day Star Wars Film Set Locations Tour from Tozeur
description: Calling all Star Wars fans. On this exclusive half-day guided tour, youll get to explore the real-life filming locations of your favorite intergalactic epic. Travel between sights in a private, air-conditioned 4WD vehicle, getting a close-up peek at Luke Skywalkers house, the streets of Mos Espa, and the Yardangs, plus many more. A half-day guided tour of Star Wars and Attack of the Clones filming locations Discover some of Tunisias most rugged and hard-to-reach desert landscapes Relax and enjoy VIP perks, like door-to-door hotel pickup and drop-off for extra convenience Tick off multiple scenic locations in a single half-day tour—the perfect time-saver excursion
